name: Penovolution
description:
An adventure undertaken by Cetz the electric cat who wants to secure the world from doggo aka dog who guards and blocks entry for the next electric portal in the electric world. Cetz must make efforts and hardwork to avoid obstacles and fight the doggo that comes in his way. Can Cetz perform security and anticipation in the electric world?

Intro (Penovolution) : Press any key

Start Game : Click Left Mouse Button

Quit Game : Click Right Mouse Button

Choose Level : Level 1 : Click Left  Mouse Button

                                 Level 2 : Scrolling Up Mouse Back :  Scrolling Down (inDevelop)

                                 Level 3 : Scrolling Up Mouse Back : Scrolling Down (InDevelop)

                                S Logo to GUI in main screen : Touch S logo or Scrolling Down

I think I'll learn more after the competition >< because some lack of features and other important things and all music i use my own music that i make~
